about_the_game:
Chapatriste is an intense FPS that immerses you in an infernal world based on the Spanish Tercios of Flandes. Face hordes of skeleton soldiers in a dark and terrifying environment where survival depends as much on your aim as on your melee combat skills.

Key Features:

  • Unique Setting: Explore a world inspired by the Spanish Tercios of Flandes, where history and hell intertwine to create an oppressive and danger-filled atmosphere.
  • Parry Mechanic: Master the parry mechanic to deflect enemy attacks and gain precious ammunition for your arsenal of weapons. Without parry, there are no bullets, and without bullets, there is no hope.
  • Varied Arsenal: Use a variety of weapons typical of the era, such as the flintlock pistol, blunderbuss, and musket, each with its own gameplay style and strategic needs.
  • Creepy Enemies: Battle relentless skeleton soldiers, each with their own abilities and attack patterns, that will test your skill and reflexes.
  • Dark and Detailed Environment: Level design that immerses the player in a medieval and gloomy setting.

Target Audience:
Aimed at players who enjoy challenging FPS games with a strong dose of melee combat and a unique historical setting, especially those looking for a dark and atmospheric experience.

This game has been developed by Timber Films thanks to the collaboration of the students from the 3D Animation, Games, and Interactive Environments program at the Higher Education Center of the Camara de Comercio de Sevilla Center.
